thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 286 2
thread.title: John Clulow
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 John Clulow

author: John Clulow
title: John Clulow
text: I have been buying from Bangood for two years, now during which I have placed over 100 orders. While I was cautious at first, and had to adjust to the delay of 2 - 4 weeks between ordering and delivery, I have found the savings, value, and quality far offset the inconvenience of waiting and I have never failed to receive an order. On the one occasion there was a problem, Banggood customer service resolved it quickly and to my satisfaction. I think Banggood's website is well designed and convenient to use. It allows me to view others' opinions of items, ask questions, and manage and track my orders. I have found Banggood's customer service staff to be courteous and helpful when I need assistance as in a recent question Carina helped me with which has prompted this review. Overall I am very happy I found the Banggood site two years ago and decided to try it.
